3.2.0.name: wordpress/paldrop-dropbox-shop
3.2.0.description:
The fastest way to sell files hosted on Dropbox! With this plugin you will get:

  • a free Paldrop merchant account (for up to 10 registered products)
  • an integrated button in your admin panel to fire up the member area
  • a sidebar widget, that links with your ID to paldrop and lists your products

Paldrop.com is the standard way to sell files hosted on Dropbox and gives you access to millions of legal digital goods that you may additionally add to your blog.

Read more about the Paldrop features here. The current version provides English accounts and will be enhanced to other languages down the road.
